mapper.update: update t_data_info set parent_code = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_code = #{dataCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_name = #{dataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display = #{display,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, parent_code, data_code, data_name, display, description, creator, create_time, updater, last_modify_time from t_data_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
